teaser.title: EuProGigant and Gaia-X
teaser.text: EuProGigant is the first funded binational industrial project with the practical implementation of the Gaia-X principles. It aims to illustrate the technological and economic benefits of the open, European multi-cloud infrastructure Gaia-X

paragraphs.title: EuProGigant
paragraphs.body: The research project **European Production Giganet** for calamity avoiding self-orchestration of value chain and learning ecosystems works on central questions related to “smart and sovereign use of data in manufacturing” and demonstrates how a highly networked production ecosystem can orchestrate itself, and be equipped with stabilising characteristics.

paragraphs.title: Gaia-X
paragraphs.body: Gaia-X is a European initiative to build a **common, secure and sovereign data infrastructure for Europe** based on the principles of trust and transparency. It was launched in early 2020, driven by policy and the economy (read more in the timeline). The aim of Gaia-X is to develop the new data infrastructure on the basis of the European legal framework, **reducing dependence on large cloud providers such as Amazon, Google, Microsoft, Alibaba and others**. Gaia-X is the first opportunity to apply European standards for the **secure and sovereign use of data in manufacturing**.
